page.description: Remove duplicate words from a list.
page.syntax: Output_String as C = Word_Unique(C Source[,C Delimiter])

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A string containing a series of delimited words or values. Character

argument.name: Delimiter
argument.description: The delimiter that separates the words or values. Character

page.discussion: The WORD_UNIQUE() function returns a list of unique words in a delimited string.
page.example: s = "a" + crlf() + "ab" + crlf() + "abc" + crlf() + "ab" + crlf() + "a" ? s = a ab abc ab a ? word_unique(s, crlf() ) = a ab abc
